name: Kernel Panic (itch)
description:
Kernel Panic is a real time strategy game prototype made during Linux Game Jam 2019. Made with Godot, first time use and fell in love :)

In this game you have to defend your computer system against malicious packets coming from your network interface. Game is currently at prototype stage. Lots of content couldn't be made.

Resource collection: You can spawn resource collection building (malloc) by clicking on main building and placing the building. After you spawn this building you need to assign a unit (memcpy) by selecting one and right clicking on the malloc building.

Warning: game lacks proper path finding, so try to play with units in a way to not make them stuck :)

You can move camera around with W A S D keys or going edge of the screen. You can also combine both for faster navigation.

You can multi select units by drag and drop or single click to choose only one unit.

You can click on ground do deselect units.

Game score determined by how long you survive with most kills. It starts slow but they come very quickly. So you need high APM to survive :)

Tools used;
* Godot 3.1
* Blender 3.8
* GIMP
* Krita
